ARABIC: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَٰقَوْمِ إِن كُنتُمْ ءَامَنتُم بِٱللَّهِ فَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلُوٓا۟ إِن كُنتُم مُّسْلِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Musa said, 'My people! if you have iman in Allah, then put your trust in Him, if you are Muslims.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Moses said: "O my people, if you do believe in God place your trust in Him if you are obedient."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Moses said: 'My people! If you believe in Allah and are truly Muslims then place your reliance on Him alone.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses told his people, "If you have submitted yourselves to God and have faith in Him, put your trust in Him".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Moosa said, “O my people! If you have accepted faith in Allah, then you should rely only upon Him, if you are Muslims.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Musa said: "O my people! If you have believed in Allah, then put your trust in Him if you are Muslims."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Musa said: O my people! if you believe in Allah, then rely on Him (alone) if you submit (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Moses said, 'O my people, if you believe in God, in Him put your trust, if you have surrendered.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Moses said: O my people! If ye have believed in Allah then put trust in Him, if ye have indeed surrendered (unto Him)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses said, "O my people; if you believe in God, [and] if you have surrendered yourselves to Him, then in Him alone put your trust."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Musa said: my people! if ye have been believing in Allah, then on Him rely, if ye are muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And Moses said, ‘O my people! If you have faith in Allah, put your trust in Him, if you have submitted [to Him].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Moses said: "O my people! If ye do (really) believe in Allah, then in Him put your trust if ye submit (your will to His)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Musa (Moses) said: "O my people! If you have believed in Allah, then put your trust in Him if you are Muslims (those who submit to Allah's Will)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Moses said: 'O my nation, if you believe in Allah, put your trust in Him, if you have surrendered (Muslims)'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Moses said, “O my people, if you have believed in God, then put your trust in Him, if you have submitted.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Moses said, "O my people, if you have believed in Allah, then rely upon Him, if you should be Muslims."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:84] And Moses said, ‘O my people, if you have believed in God then put your trust in Him, if you have [truly] submitted [to Him]’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Moses said: my people! If you have believed in Allah then put trust in Him, if ye have indeed surrendered (unto Him)) because you have indeed surrendered to Allah!
